title: Ticket #5662: +foo=bar missing from manual
description: The submit file syntax for putting arbitrary classad attributes into the job ad (e.g. '+foo = "bar"') is not in the manual, or is buried where I can't find it. I expected to see it in section 2.5, Submitting a Job. It's useful, so it should probably be in there...
remarks:
Looks like it's always been missing? I have no idea how I learned about it in the first place :P

2016-May-11 13:46:37 by tannenba:
It is documented in the condor_submit man page, which contains the comprehensive list of what can go into a submit file.

Having said that, it would be good for section 2.5 to mention it and also to refer readers to the condor_submit man page for a comprehensive list of all the goodies that can go into the submit file.
check_ins: 2016-Dec-08 16:52   Check-in [49770]: Gittrac #5662: Added more documentation of the +<attr>=<value> submit file option. (By Kent Wenger )
creator: matyas
